Content.details:
The tx_transfer must be updated to prevent very large batch transfers.

The code used to generate the WASM attached to this proposal can be found here: https://github.com/anoma/namada-governance-upgrades/blob/390cf675a603c251186e255686637a450109e629/update-tx-transfer/src/lib.rs.

Please see the forum discussion linked here for more details.
Content.title: Update the transfer tx in on-chain storage ahead of Phase 5
